value:
$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|C'mon, Professor. Join me for a dip
in the ocean!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Ahem. Your guidance is quite
unnecessary, Dorothea. She will
be accompanying me.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|What are you talking about? The
professor is going swimming with US.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Ingrid's right. Step aside, lesser
houses.$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|Uh...$k$p$nMPID_レア|My, my. Byleth, you are quite
popular.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|I think it's YOU who ought to leave,
Sylvain. Read the room. A noble, at
least, should know when to quit.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Was that a jab at me, perchance?$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|N-no, not at all.$k$p$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Let's stop bickering. The Professor
can decide for herself.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Ah, a fine idea. Well, Professor,
whom will you join for a swim?$k$p

$WmMPID_水着イングリット,ch17_19_Ingrid_F_Swim20,Face|Ah! The ocean's a lot colder than I
expected. But, it feels so refreshing!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Oh, Ingrid. You are just too cute.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|What do you think of that lady
over there, Sylvain?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Already got my eyes on her. And
look, she's noticed me too! Time for
me to make my moves.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Nonsense! She's ogling at my refined
nobility. I'll be the one to charm her.$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|Surely she'd prefer a fun guy like me
instead of someone full of hot air!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Hey, you two! The Professor said no
fighting. We're supposed to be
enjoying ourselves.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Hm. Then I suppose we'll let bygones
be bygones. Shall we head over
together?$k$p$WmMPID_水着シルヴァン,ch17_16_Sylvain_M_Swim20,Face|...Fine.$k$p$WmMPID_レア,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|They're all getting along swimmingly.
You must be so pleased, Byleth.$k$p$nMPID_比翼ベレス|I am. The different classes are
mingling cordially.$k$p$nMPID_レア|It's nothing short of a miracle that
students hailing from other countries
can all unite under one academy.$k$pAnd now that we're in a new world
for summer break, we cannot let the
goddess's blessing go to waste.$k$p$WmMPID_水着ドロテア,ch17_11_Dorothea_F_Swim20,Face|Hey, Professor! What're you standing
around for? Come and join us!$k$p$WmMPID_水着ローレンツ,ch17_20_Lorenz_M_Swim20,Face|Agreed, you haven't even gone in the
water yet!$k$p$WmMPID_比翼ベレス,ch17_01_Beleth_FF_Pair,Face|Coming!$k$p
